word:
"Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment" (1 Corinthians 1:4-10).--Ms 43, 1907. ("Exhortation to Faithfulness to Church Members and Elders," typed March 12, 1907.) 

Released September 23, 1976.
